title: Making Ambient With the Norand Mono (and friends)
description:
I got the idea recently that the pure analog tones of the Norand Mono would sound lovely through some effects. From there I cooked up an ambient patch using the Hapax, Peak, and Eurorack. Let me walk you through the patch and how it works.

Final patch: https://youtu.be/IpSPMp3MqhY

Gear in this video: 
Norand Mono: https://norand.io/mono
Squarp Hapax: https://squarp.net/hapax/
Hologram Microcosm: https://www.hologramelectronics.com/microcosm
